name: Rivals Road Roit
description:
Show your skills in the racing and shooting game to get the title of the top shooter. Cars with guns in a deadly race is the perfect mixture for the clash of cars, where only rule is to kill or be killed.

You can race against time and kill the future robots and hurdles. Futuristic world racing environment with rage racing having sports robot will make the sports car racing, the unique high speed racing game.
This app has a lot of challenging missions for you. Have you got what it takes to become the best shooter? Clear all the levels to become the top shooter in fun kid racing. Choose your favorite brutal super car and conquer. Only first level is unlocked. To unlock the next level clear the previous one. Play missions again and again to get enough coins to buy the next car. There are three cars available for you. Are you ready to dominate the car driving and shooting arena?

Futuristic Racing Rivals Features:
• An immersive shooter experience
• 3D Futuristic themed graphics
• Epic upgrades to modify your vehicle
• Console quality HD graphics
• Challenging missions
• Real sci fi Environment
